title: Average attendance of the main football leagues in Europe 2018 to 2019
yAxis: Average attendance in thousands of people
summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
League Name Bundesliga (Germany) has the highest Average attendance in thousands of people and Ligue 1 (France) has the lowest Average attendance in thousands of people.
The highest League Name Bundesliga (Germany) has 20.6 more Average attendance in thousands of people than the lowest League Name Ligue 1 (France).
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing League Name, and Average attendance in thousands of people in each League Name on the y axis.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is appeared to be the highest at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and lowest at League Name Ligue 1 (France).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
League Name Bundesliga (Germany) has the highest Average attendance in thousands of people and Ligue 1 (France) has the lowest Average attendance in thousands of people.
The highest League Name Bundesliga (Germany) has 20.6 more Average attendance in thousands of people than the lowest League Name Ligue 1 (France).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
The Average attendance in thousands of people is highest at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and lowest at League Name Ligue 1 (France).
The second highest Average attendance in thousands of people is appeared to be the League Name Premier League (England).
There is a difference of 20.6 between the maximum League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and minimum League Name Ligue 1 (France).
Average attendance in thousands of people at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) is 42.7 , second place is Premier League (England) at 38.0, and thirdly is La Liga (Spain) at 27.2.
The highest value 42.7 at Bundesliga (Germany) is almost 1.38 times larger than the average value 30.94.
